snippet.title: Pirates Outlaws 2 Heritage - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Pirates Outlaws 2: Heritage coming in 2025. The reputed roguelike deckbuilder game returns.
October 25th - 31st: Open Beta available on Steam
Prepare for the fascinating sequel to the pirate adventure, new worlds and challenges await your conquest!

🌟 Wishlist Now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3025160/
🗣️ Join the Discussion on Discord: https://discord.gg/BEvZrJWPth
🌐 Discover More on Our Website: https://fabledgame.com/
